//weight: calculating the weight of this magazine has proven to be extremely-difficult, in large part due to even the manufacturer of the magazine/firearm being vague and uncertain about the overall weight of the pistol
seemingly the same model of Five-seveN is being listed as either 21 oz or 23 oz on the same website (on page and in sell sheet, respectively)
even independent calculations hardly make sense, with some of them suggesting the magazine weighs as little as 7 g
we use the more-precise weight stated in an owner's manual (without magazine, 1.36 lbs) and a French store (with empty magazine, 1.46 lbs) to calculate the weight

notes: zero trim assumes the floor plate and the uneven parts of the magazine ultimately even out
